head.title: Balado Tahu Telor (Bean Curd & Eggs in Fried Pounded Chillie

ing.item: Block tahu, slice in six/eight pieces
Fresh red peppers (you can remove the seeds if you want to) (up to 10)

directions.step:
However, I did find the recipe below by following the links at: http://www.euronet.nl/users/tampopo/foodpage/index.html I hope this is close to what you wanted.
Method: Deep fry the eggs ( till the skin is change to golden brown colour) and tahu. Pound/grind the peppers, shallots, garlic, belacan not too fine. Fry the paste with hot oil in a wok. Add the shrimps and cook it for about 3 minutes. Add the fried boiled eggs and tahu. Finally add the tomatoes, salt and sugar. Cook again for about 3 minutes.
